sourcesContent:
export const demoProjects = [
  {
    id: "PROJ001",
    clientName: "ABC Corp",
    totalAmount: 15000,
    depositPaid: 7500,

    priority: "High"

  {

    clientName: "TechStart Inc",
    totalAmount: 25000,
    depositPaid: 0,
    depositDate: null,
    expectedCompletion: "2025-08-15",

    status: "Pending",
    monthOfPayment: "August 2025",
    priority: "High"
  },
  {
    id: "PROJ011",
    clientName: "Web Design Pro",
    totalAmount: 9000,
    depositPaid: 9000,
    depositDate: "2025-07-20",

    status: "Completed",

  },
  {

    status: "In Progress",
    monthOfPayment: "September 2025",
    priority: "High"
  },
  {

  },
  {

];
